crazyballrun.game.gui.controls

Class CBLoadImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • crazyballrun.game.gui.GUIControl
      • crazyballrun.game.gui.controls.CBLoadImage

  • public class CBLoadImage
extends GUIControl
    The CBLoadImage control is a full-screen picture for a particular level's load-screen.
